title: Golf Digest font ?
content:
Hello,

I am looking for similar slab serif which is used in Golf Digest logotype.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227203954im_/http:/typophile.com/files/golf_digest_3933.jpg)

Thanks for help
author: syncro

comments.content:
PMN Caecilia, probably the [heavy](http://web.archive.org/web/20150227203954/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/pmn_caecilia_85_heavy_osf/?sample_text=Golf%20Digest&sample_size=36&acs_p=1&acs_pt=24&acs=1) weight.

- Lex
Wow, thanks for really fast answers.
